description: On returning home from a day out, the boyfriend stupidly forgets the house rules... Once home, his ego is emasculated, something which he needs reminding of with a sharp face slap and a few choice words. Once slapped into shape, he adopts the only position allowed in his Mistress's presence, on his knees, worshipping at her heels. Miss Zoe teases and torments him, all the while making sure he knows who's always in control behind closed doors.
title: House Rules
